snippet: Stony Brook, which opened the tournament as a No. 4 seed in the regional round, won the deciding game of the Baton Rouge super regional over the six-time national champion Tigers.
abstract: Stony Brook baseball team advances to the College World Series with a 7-2 victory over Louisiana State in the deciding game of the Baton Rouge super regional.
lead_paragraph: Stony Brook, which opened the tournament as a No. 4 seed in the regional round, won the deciding game of the Baton Rouge super regional over the six-time national champion Tigers.

headline.seo: Stony Brook Defeats L.S.U. to Advance to College World Series
headline.main: Stony Brook Defeats L.S.U. to Advance to College World Series

keywords.value: State University of New York at Stony Brook
